message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This unique item has been meticulously crafted and holds significant value to us at $15000. Given its worth to you is estimated at $10000, we believe this could be an opportunity for both of us. Considering the quality and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the chance to acquire it at a special introductory price of $12000. I look forward to hearing your response soon. Kind regards, Alice.
